show_name: Detective Conan: Hyōteki wa Kogoro! Shōnen Tanteidan Maruchichōsa (OAV)
other_title: Detective Conan: The Target is Kogoro! The Detective Boys' Secret Investigation
名探偵コナン: 標的は小五郎!! 少年探偵団丸秘調査 (Japanese)
plot: Receiving a class assignment to research a profession, the detective boys decide to shadow Kogoro for a day.
